id_1.name: Bumblebee
id_1.desc1: Common guard`s pistol. Has infinite AMMO, but also has low damage and high rate of fire.
id_1.desc3: Float like a butterfly, sting like the genius.

id_2.name: Cola
id_2.desc1: Tasty galaxy cola! Restores few Health Points
id_2.desc3: Side effects: dizziness, nausea, hallucinations, hemorrhoids, cancer, death.

id_3.name: Laser}Rifle
id_3.desc1: Rifle that has megacool red laser! High damage and piercing effect!

id_4.name: Shotgun
id_4.desc1: Ultra High damage at short range, but low at long.

id_5.name: Minigun
id_5.desc1: With this you are angel of death! Middle damage, but very high rate of fire.

id_6.name: Medkit
id_6.desc3: They still have not gotten rid of injections.
